title: Which will increase U.S. trade deficit

content.prompt: Which of the following will increase the United States trade deficit?

choices.label: United States firms buying technologically advanced computers from Germany
European citizens traveling in large numbers to the United States
A United States company being hired to build a production plant in another country
The United States dollar depreciating in the foreign exchange market
The United States selling one million tons of wheat to China

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
